SEARCH
Package emissary.output.filter

Class AbstractFilter

java.lang.Object
emissary.output.filter.AbstractFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDropOffFilter
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractRollableFilter, DataFilter
public abstract class AbstractFilter extends Object implements IDropOffFilter
Provides the base mechanism for a drop off filter

    • loadFilterConfiguration

      protected void loadFilterConfiguration(@Nullable Configurator suppliedFilterConfig)
      Load the filter configuration with precendence of provided, named, default Preference order for loading configurations
      1. [filter-package].FILTER_NAME.cfg
      2. [filter-package].[filter-class]-FILTER_NAME.cfg
      3. [filter-package].[filter-class].cfg
      Parameters:
      suppliedFilterConfig - configuration to use when not null

    • isOutputtable

      protected boolean isOutputtable(String type)

      Parameters:
      type - of the data

    • isOutputtable

      protected boolean isOutputtable(Collection<String> types)
      Determine is this payload should be output by this filter Usually by the primary view or one of the alternate views being on the outputTypes list from the run-time type configuration stream for the filter in question.
      Parameters:
      types - types to check
      Returns:
      true if any one of the types is outputtable

    • getTypesToCheck

      protected Set<String> getTypesToCheck(IBaseDataObject d)

      Parameters:
      d - the payload

      protected Set<String> getPrimaryTypesToCheck(IBaseDataObject d)

      Parameters:
      d - the payload
